channel.title: Zenithscape client has a problem, NOT US!
channel.description:
I keep seeing people complaining about the Zenithscape client (Including myself) and people replying with things like "Did you portfoward correctly" or "Make sure you have no-ip set up" and frankly, it's pissing me off.
[b]PEOPLE ARE CHANGING THE IP CORRECTLY AND PORTFOWARDING CORRECTLY![/b]
I'm posting this to clear it up. Here are some pictures from http://canyouseeme.org/
[IMG]http://i763.photobucket.com/albums/xx273/v1nch3nz0/Untitled-14.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i763.photobucket.com/albums/xx273/v1nch3nz0/Untitled-15.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@Deathly_Claws wrote:

Anyone know how to fix that ^^? Or do you have to make like a custom client?

Read full topic
